subject: [Radiance-general] How to generate surface with gensurf program?
body:
Hi Casper,

These blinds have complex geometry - each lamella has multiple curves (for
light redirection), so genblinds is not useful here.

Marija

On Fri, Nov 11, 2011 at 11:34 AM, Casper Esmeijer
<C.Esmeijer at mook.peutz.nl>wrote:
